data.title: U.S. House's antitrust report hints at break-up of Big Tech firms: lawmaker
data.text: The U.S. House of Representatives antitrust report on Big Tech firms contains a "thinly veiled call to break up" the companies, Republican Congressman Ken Buck said in a draft response seen by Reuters.

data.title: Fired Amazon Employee Arrested After Amazon Reported Him to Federal Bureau of Investigation
data.text: SEATTLE--(BUSINESS WIRE)--The U.S. Department of Justice on Friday brought charges against a former Amazon employee for federal wire fraud and aggravated identity theft.

data.title: Amazon 'Creating The 75-day Peak Season,' Analyst Says
data.text: The dawn of a new type of peak season is fast approaching, courtesy of the usual suspect. Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) decision to move its Prime Day online buying extravaganza from July to Oct. 13 and 14 may have been triggered by concerns over the coronavirus pandemic.

data.title: Amazon Expands Transparency Service to Japan & Australia
data.text: Amazon (AMZN) offers counterfeit protection in Japan and Australia with the help of Transparency service.

data.title: Amazon's New Device to Boost Contactless Payment Presence
data.text: Amazon (AMZN) unveils a new contactless device, Amazon One, in a bid to expand presence in the contactless payments space.

data.title: Walmart signs trio of drone deals as it races to play catch-up with Amazon
data.text: Walmart has struck deals with three drone operators to test how the technology could be used to expand on-demand deliveries and help it better compete with Amazon.
